Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Analyte(s): STEC (Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli) stx1/stx2 genes
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ABI 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EntericBio Dx Assay, a multiplex real-time PCR in vitro diagnostic for qualitative detection of multiple enteric bacterial and parasitic pathogens in Cary-Blair preserved stool specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex PCR assay to detect and identify Salmonella, Shigella/EIEC, STEC, Campylobacter, Vibrio spp., Entamoeba histolytica, and Giardia lamblia nucleic acids in Cary-Blair preserved stool from symptomatic patients, as an aid in diagnosis of enteric infections.
